nausea.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the feeling that you have when you think you are going to vomit (=bring food up from your stomach through your mouth)
nausea.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: A feeling of nausea suddenly came over me.
nausea.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: Some patients suffer from nausea and headaches.
The medicine can cause nausea and dizziness.
Nausea swept over him when he tried to stand.
Many women have feelings of nausea in early pregnancy.
A terrible wave of nausea swept over her.
The woman suffered from severe nausea and vomiting.
The tablets can cause mild nausea.
